title: Hybrid - Rhythmic Music Loops
description: A collection of loops from a variety of instruments, including 28 musical sketches containing guitar, flute, percussion, cyberpunk, orchestral strings, piano, and mouth harp that are perfect for backgrounds and dynamic action scenes.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/sets/hybrid-rhythmic-music-loops

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/bknmv1xgiewf5ll/MSE%20-%20Hybrid%20-%20Rhythmic%20Music%20Loops_v1.0.pdf?dl=0


The package contains 28 musical loops in a single 120bpm tempo, with a total duration of over 23 minutes, including:

  • 5 cyberpunk music themes
  • 4 themes with flute
  • 2 themes with guitar
  • 1 theme with mount harp
  • 6 themes with percussion
  • 2 themes with piano
  • 8 themes with orchestral strings


All tracks are mixed and mastered with careful use of equalization, compression and saturation.


Use loops as ready-made compositions for gameplay dynamic or calm scenes, background menus, trailer music, animations or videos.


You can also divide all completed compositions into bars or beats, and to create ever-changing music and extra variation, you can start your beat from a new place each time. Don't be afraid to experiment.


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 28 music loops
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • 7 varieties of instruments
  • all tracks in 120bpm
  • great for dynamic or calm scenes and backgrounds
  • perfect for RPG, Fantasy, Adventure, Space, Simulation, Arcade and other game genres


Number of Audio Wavs: 28

Number of Audio Cues: 28

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 23 minutes 44 seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
